Title: Bright Bait
Description:
Certain fish are only attracted to bright lights.  The forest north of here is home to a local pandaren firefly called a suncrawler.

You should be able to find them on the base of the tree trunks all around that area.  Bring me back a handful of them and I can use them for bait!
ObjectivesText: Collect 7 Suncrawlers in the forest north of Anglers Wharf.
PortraitGiverText: These small, glowing insects can be found on the roots of trees in Krasarang Wilds.
